translation.zh: ‎不管你走哪条路 都是上天注定 ‎（服务他人是你上天堂的租金）

translation.zh: ‎我父亲和凯瑟斯克莱相遇是上天注定

translation.en: Three short years that they would spend in their lives,
translation.zh: ‎他们在一起度过了人生中短短的三年

translation.en: that destiny created for them…
that was their blood brotherhood.

translation.zh: ‎我们不再是奴隶 不再为白人所拥有

translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯那晚打倒索尼利斯顿

translation.zh: ‎赋予他 他所需要的力量

translation.en: to speak.

They were very close…
…literally as brothers.

translation.zh: ‎你哥哥喜欢和马尔科姆在一起吗？

translation.en: Loved, loved, loved being around him. I did too.
translation.zh: ‎我哥哥非常非常喜欢 我也是

translation.en: He had that air about him.
It was divine.
The electricity that came from his body was sacred.
translation.zh: ‎他浑身散发着受人崇敬的气度

translation.en: Only a few people like that in the world.
[documentary interviewer] Why do you think they stopped being friends?
translation.zh: ‎他们的友谊终结的原因是什么？

translation.en: [Rahman] Well…
"Destiny can take your best friend as an instrument to cause you harm
translation.zh: ‎“命运能利用你最好的朋友来伤害你

translation.zh: ‎我们是是时候该为自己而战

translation.zh: ‎在白人至上的世界里 黑人就是这样

translation.en: You are unloved, uncared for, untended to,
translation.zh: ‎你不被爱、不被在意、不被关怀

translation.en: and viewed less beautiful, less moral, less intelligent,

Malcolm X, Muhammad Ali…
no way.
Malcolm X and Muhammad Ali

translation.zh:
‎做一个自由有爱的人
‎要付出巨大的代价

-I am the king of the world! -[reporter] Hold it.

[Muhammad] I'm a bad man!
-[reporter] Wait-- -[Muhammad] I shook up the world!
I shook up the world!

to think of themself as quote, "pretty."

translation.zh: ‎世界冠军 应该跟我一样漂亮

translation.en: Tenacity and dignity and, like, pride,

translation.zh: ‎给人感觉“你不喜欢我又怎样？”

-A bad fella? -[interviewer] I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-像坏人吗？
‎-我不知道 凯瑟斯

translation.zh: ‎你…如你自己所说 是最棒的

translation.zh: ‎都接受不了 说他喋喋不休

translation.zh: ‎做什么样的人 怎么想是我的自由

translation.en: [interviewer] That's right.
[Dr. Boyd] They're changing the way the world saw… the Black man.
translation.zh: ‎他们在改变世界看待黑人的方式

rule so many Black people?
Martin Luther King, whose school of thought I come out of,
translation.zh: ‎我深受马丁路德金学派的影响

translation.en: spoke to who we must become.
translation.zh: ‎它告诉我们必须成为怎样的人

translation.zh: ‎迈克华莱士做了这档电视节目

translation.zh: ‎穆斯林在美国的一个主要城市

translation.zh: ‎这一团体的创始人和精神领袖演讲

translation.zh: ‎这是不是说 白人天生就是邪恶的？

This critique of whiteness was very powerful,
translation.zh: ‎这种对白人的批判富有冲击力

translation.en: because prior to this time,
you had to say something like that in private.

Not out loud.
By nature, he is evil.

translation.zh: ‎他是个了不起的人 据他自己承认

translation.zh: ‎但现在他变了 他不抽烟不喝酒

translation.en: His life changed for him when the Muslim faith

translation.zh:
‎为自己的黑人身份感到羞耻
‎他的人生就此改变

translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆的父亲就是很好的参考
‎当然还有他的母亲

translation.en: Earl, his father, and Louise, his mother,
translation.zh: ‎他的父亲厄尔和母亲露易丝

translation.zh: ‎是马库斯加维运动的追随者

to link Africans,
in Africa, in the Caribbean, in the United States.
translation.zh:
‎那些在非洲、加勒比地区
‎和美国的非洲人

translation.en: My father felt that instead of Africans being servile,
translation.zh: ‎我父亲认为非洲人与其做奴隶

translation.en: they must become self-reliant.
[Dr. West] There is no Malcolm X without Garvey.
Garvey used to say,
"The Negro… is not afraid."
[Herb] There's no more significant influence you could have
translation.zh: ‎这个年轻的黑人男孩受到了

translation.en: for a young Black boy,
is to be in the company of a father who is so well-versed
translation.zh: ‎他身边有一位那样有学识的父亲

translation.en: and had the-- An audience in his hand,
you know, as both a minister, a preacher,

translation.zh: ‎也是整个加维运动的代表人物

translation.en: [man] Malcolm's father was Malcolm's hero.
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆的父亲是他的英雄

translation.zh: ‎但问题是 有白人至上主义者

[Ilyasah] It was horrific, what they did to him.

dragged to the trolley track

[Herb] For the first five or six years of his life,
he had a kind of a first-hand opportunity

translation.zh: ‎这些年来 他肯定会回想起

translation.en: of the whole Garvey movement.

translation.zh:
‎那个组织培养出

Elijah Muhammad took what he had learned:
translation.zh: ‎伊利贾穆罕默德吸收所学的

translation.en: the concept of having an economic base,
the discipline, and the militaristic attire,

translation.zh: ‎将这些融入黑人穆斯林的宗教环境

translation.zh:

he goes back to Michigan,

translation.zh:
‎我很骄傲 也很高兴地说

translation.zh: ‎他当时还小 十多岁的时候

translation.zh: ‎那栋粉色房子就是穆罕默德阿里的家

junior high school, and senior high school.
Central High School's the only Black school

translation.zh: ‎我们没有白人学校的主要设施

translation.zh: ‎在整合学校前 中央高中里

translation.zh: ‎老凯瑟斯克莱是南方浸信会信徒

translation.zh:
‎小凯瑟斯克莱

translation.zh: ‎他告诉我有一次他去路易斯维尔

translation.zh:
‎里面人唱的圣歌
‎和他们在教堂里唱的一样

translation.zh: ‎一名牧师出来说：“喂 小子 快走开”

translation.zh: ‎凭什么因为我是黑人就要离开？”

translation.zh: ‎公交车站会有“有色人种候车区”

translation.zh: ‎百货商店不允许有色人种试衣服

translation.zh:
‎据说是因为

translation.zh:

translation.zh:
‎他在《黑玉》杂志上看到
‎爱默特提尔残缺的脸

translation.zh:
‎他从父亲口中得知的那些
‎关于私刑的可怕故事

translation.zh: ‎他父亲像如今所有黑人一样

translation.zh: ‎我在七号清真寺餐厅遇到了马尔科姆

translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆走进来 很高大

translation.zh: ‎我第一次亲眼见到马尔科姆

translation.zh: ‎他穿堂而过 跟所有人握手

translation.zh:

translation.zh:
‎两个小时 三个小时 四个小时

translation.zh: ‎他们绑架我们 把我们带来这里

translation.zh: ‎我从没听过有人像他那样清晰地描述

the television programs,

translation.zh: ‎那些都在持续地对我们进行心理攻击

translation.zh: ‎不管你多大年纪都被人叫“小子”

translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯克莱为美国赢得冠军

translation.zh: ‎即使在那时候 他也有惊人的魅力

translation.zh: ‎他拿到了奖牌 举着它 ‎“看着我 看我是谁 我多漂亮…

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我的曾曾祖父是肯塔基州的奴隶

translation.zh:

translation.en: -[crowd] That's right. -Tell me that.

translation.zh: ‎教训起人来丝毫不会手下留情

translation.zh:

‎我们恨那些对他们不公的人

translation.zh: ‎这是肯塔基州路易斯维尔的WHAS

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎世界排名第四的重量级拳击手 你好

translation.zh:
‎你觉得你是

translation.zh: ‎不是一样厉害 是更厉害

translation.zh: ‎我更优秀 速度更快 话更多

translation.zh: ‎谁会赢得罗马奥运会的金牌？

translation.zh:
‎他是个英雄 ‎（凯瑟斯克莱

translation.zh:
‎但当他回到路易斯维尔

translation.zh: ‎我刚从罗马回来 我想做职业拳击手

translation.zh: ‎黑人运动员在民权问题上会态度顺从

translation.zh: ‎他们能露脸 但没话语权

translation.zh: ‎体验过海外没有隔离制度的社会

translation.zh:
‎餐台上有个白人说

translation.zh: ‎他穿着奥运会运动服 戴着金牌

In that moment, he rejects America.
He rips the medal off,
tosses it into the river.
That disappointment, thinking, "Okay, I've done this for America,
translation.zh: ‎他无比失望 心里想：“我为美国夺冠

translation.zh:
‎我是拳王 那么了不起

Okay? Something that can be marketed.

chairman of the board of Brown-Forman Distillers Corporation.

translation.zh:

J.D. Stetson Coleman.

translation.zh: ‎跟他们说话 你会感觉到

translation.zh: ‎他们在谈论他们的一匹赛马

to train under Angelo Dundee,
translation.zh: ‎接受拳击界最好的教练之一

translation.zh: ‎他遇到了一个叫阿卜杜尔拉曼的人

translation.zh: ‎我父亲是迈阿密清真寺的教长 ‎（拉曼瓦利）

translation.zh: ‎这是那个时期 的清真寺区域

He hears a guy from across the street yell out,
"Why are we called Negroes?"
"Why are we deaf, dumb and blind?"
translation.zh: ‎我们为什么又聋 又笨 又瞎？”

translation.en: "Why is everybody making progress, and we're so far behind?"
translation.zh:
‎“为什么大家都在进步

translation.zh:
‎我爸就说

translation.zh: ‎“是的 兄弟 我叫凯瑟斯克莱”

[Randy] There's no sense for most of America
that Cassius Clay has a secret.
That he's leading a double life.

translation.zh:
‎1959年 凯瑟斯克莱
‎在芝加哥参加业余拳演出

translation.en: He had free time, he's out on the street,
and he sees members of the Nation of Islam.
translation.zh: ‎见到了伊斯兰民族组织的成员

translation.en: And one of them hands him a record.
"A White Man's Heaven…" [Dr. Boyd] "…Is a Black Man's Hell"
by Louis X, eventually known as Louis Farrakhan,
translation.zh:
‎作者是路易斯艾克斯
‎真名是路易斯法拉罕

translation.en: at one time known as Calypso Gene the Charmer.
translation.zh: ‎他一度被称作卡利普索弄蛇人

translation.en: [Louis Farrakhan singing] ♪ Before we came to America ♪ ♪ We were living in the East ♪
translation.zh:
‎（卡利普索
‎曾用名卡利普索弄蛇人）

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] So Cassius takes this record back to Louisville,
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯把这张唱片带回路易斯维尔

translation.zh: ‎他在迈阿密第五街体育馆训练时

translation.zh: ‎我看到出现了一些不同的面孔

translation.en: Sam Saxon, Captain Sam, is with him.
translation.zh: ‎山姆萨克森山姆毛拉在他身边

translation.en: And as far as Angelo Dundee knows,
he's a boyhood pal who he lets hang around the gym.
translation.zh: ‎他们成了好哥们 他请他来体育馆

translation.en: I just got through with the Henry Cooper fight.
translation.zh: ‎我刚结束和亨利库珀的战斗

translation.en: [Wali] Every day, they would get together.

translation.zh: ‎他给凯瑟斯克莱介绍伊斯兰教 ‎传授他教义

translation.en: [Zaheer] The Nation of Islam began to provide Clay
translation.zh: ‎伊斯兰民族组织开始让克莱了解

translation.en: a whole language of Black excellence
and Black supreme achievement.

translation.zh: ‎山姆毛拉开始指导凯瑟斯克莱

translation.zh:
‎让他了解尊敬的

translation.en: And these Negro leaders…

Cassius becomes closer to the Nation of Islam.
translation.zh:
‎凯瑟斯
‎向伊斯兰民族组织更迈进了一步

translation.en: He doesn't join the Nation,
but he's interested.

translation.zh:
‎你觉得你哥哥没有他的信仰
‎会成为最伟大的拳手吗

The faith of Islam gave-- Gave-- Gave-- Gave us confidence.
G-- God-- Oh, my God is decent,
God is powerful, God is ri-- Righteous.
translation.zh: ‎真主是强大的 真主是正义的

translation.en: Elijah Muhammad, Malcolm X gave us confidence to be great.
translation.zh:
‎伊利贾穆罕默德
‎和马尔科姆X给了他自信

translation.zh:
‎6月凯瑟斯和弟弟
‎在路易斯维尔的家中

The Nation of Islam was holding a big rally in Detroit.
translation.zh:
‎伊斯兰民族组织
‎正在底特律举行盛大集会

Captain Sam drives from Miami to Louisville,
translation.zh: ‎山姆毛拉从迈阿密开车去路易斯维尔

translation.zh: ‎接上克莱兄弟一起去了底特律

translation.zh:
‎但在去奥林匹亚体育场之前

translation.zh: ‎他总是坐在桌子旁 面对着门

translation.en: You know, almost like kind of an Old West cowboy movie.
translation.zh: ‎就像是西部牛仔老电影里那样

translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆的桌子周围是保镖

translation.zh: ‎真有趣 ‎我父亲不知道他是谁

translation.zh: ‎却愿意配合 那种自负感

"Of course I know you, you're great." [laughs]

translation.zh:
‎他说出了黑人在美国
‎被不供应对待的真相

translation.en: It wasn't hate, it was truth.
translation.zh: ‎不是宣扬仇恨 而是道出真相

translation.zh: ‎鲁迪和凯瑟斯进入奥林匹亚体育场

translation.en: And what do they see?
They see an army of Black men.
Proud Black men,
dressed in black suits, bow ties,
and there's a sense of order, there's a sense of discipline.
translation.zh: ‎让人感受到一种秩序和纪律性

translation.en: [Elijah] Before the white man, we had great civilizations
translation.zh: ‎在白人之前 我们有伟大的文明

translation.en: just as powerful than what the white man has put on the Earth.
translation.zh: ‎跟白人在地球上的力量一样强大

translation.zh:
‎凯瑟斯那天听到的信息是
‎不脱离则死亡

translation.en: -[Elijah] Separation or death. -[crowd applauds, cheers]
[Elijah] We don't want no integration. We want separation.
translation.zh: ‎我们不想融合 我们要脱离

translation.en: [Elijah] We don't nothing but the freedom

translation.zh: ‎拥有可以让我们称之为家园的土地

translation.en: This analysis of the white man being the devil
was really attractive to people
who had experienced hell at the hands of white people.

translation.zh: ‎免遭私刑 那我们信它何用？

translation.en: [crowd] Right.
They say they are followers of Jesus.
They're followers of the devil.

showed up in Muslim mosques and restaurants in various cities."
translation.zh:
‎在不同城市的
‎穆斯林清真寺和餐馆出现” ‎（《马尔科姆X自传》）

translation.en: "And if I happened to be speaking anywhere within reasonable distance
translation.zh: ‎“如果我传教的地方碰巧离凯瑟斯

translation.en: of wherever Cassius was, he would be present."
translation.zh: ‎所在的地方不远 他就会到场”

Cassius is in New York for the fight against Doug Jones.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯为与道格琼斯的比赛来到纽约

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] Who's there?
Malcolm has taken a special interest in this young heavyweight.
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆对这个年轻的
‎重量级拳手特别感兴趣

translation.en: [boxing commentator] Clay, winner by unanimous decision.
[Dr. Smith] The next day, Cassius Clay is seen out in public
translation.zh: ‎第二天凯瑟斯克莱出现在公众视野中

translation.en: wearing the dark suit, the white shirt, the black bow tie.
translation.zh: ‎穿着黑色西装 白色衬衫 打着黑领结

translation.en: Then he gives an interview to the New York Post.
translation.zh: ‎他接受了《 纽约邮报》的采访

translation.en: He was asked about why he didn't join civil rights marches.
translation.zh: ‎他被问道为何没参加民权游行

translation.en: He says that, "I don't believe in non-violence."
And that, "I believe in an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth."
translation.zh: ‎还说“我相信以眼还眼 以牙还牙”

He's in Harlem.
He was spending time with Malcolm.

translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆把穆罕默德阿里
‎带到清真寺 介绍给我们

translation.en: They had this kind of student-teacher relationship.
[Herb] Their age difference…
22-year-old Adonis,
and here's-- Here's Malcolm coming in, a little bit older.
translation.zh: ‎跟着年纪稍长的马尔科姆走进来

translation.en: An understanding of the world
that's gonna be important to-- To Muhammad Ali.
translation.zh: ‎对穆罕默德阿里来说很重要

translation.en: You can't be around Malcolm and not learn.
translation.zh: ‎在马尔科姆身边必然会学到东西

translation.en: Malcolm shared the wisdom.
[Malcolm] If the government can't defend us, what should we do?
translation.zh: ‎政府不为我们说话 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: Go find out who bombed the church in Birmingham, Alabama.
translation.zh:
‎去查出炸毁阿拉巴马州
‎伯明翰那间教堂的犯人

translation.en: If they can't find out, then let us go find out.
translation.zh: ‎既然他们查不出来 就让我们自己查

translation.en: And when we find--
-[crowd applauds] -I don't wanna hear that.
And when we find out who it was
who murdered our little female babies,
translation.zh: ‎害死四名小女孩的凶手是谁

translation.en: then the law of justice is that a murderer should be murdered.
translation.zh: ‎就将其正法 杀人者偿命

translation.zh: ‎当凯瑟斯克莱遇见马尔科姆X时

translation.en: he has no idea Malcolm is moving in a new political direction.
translation.zh:
‎他并不知道马尔科姆

translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆认为如果加入前线

translation.en: to make a much bigger difference if it joins the front lines.
translation.zh: ‎伊斯兰民族组织会有潜力扭转乾坤

translation.en: Don't you be fooled by these Uncle Tom Negro preachers.
translation.zh: ‎别被这些逆来顺受的黑人牧师哄骗

translation.en: When a dog attacks you, you get that dog,
translation.zh: ‎当狗攻击你 你必须反击

translation.zh: ‎无论面对的狗是两条腿还是四条腿

translation.zh: ‎他不主张暴力 他主张自卫

translation.en: [Dr. Boyd] We're not trying to start anything. Don't start no shit,
translation.zh: ‎我们不想惹是生非 ‎不惹麻烦 相安无事

translation.en: won't be none started.
But if you come for us, be prepared to fight,
translation.zh: ‎但如果你们欺负我们 就准备迎战吧

translation.en: because we're not embracing this Martin Luther King philosophy.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们不信奉
‎马丁路德金那套处事原则

translation.zh:
‎在许多伊利贾
‎写给马尔科姆的信中 他提醒道

Elijah said,
"The judgment of white America will come at the hands of God."
translation.zh: ‎“对白人美国的审判权在真主手中”

translation.en: For Malcolm, this did not align
translation.zh: ‎对马尔科姆来说 这不符合

translation.en: with his desire to see justice more immediately.

translation.zh: ‎只要有人领导这场所谓的民权斗争…

translation.zh: ‎我说的“领导”是引用他人的说法

translation.en: Actually contained by Uncle Tom Negro leaders,
translation.zh: ‎实际是由逆来顺受的黑人所领导

translation.en: then the white power structure isn't worried at all.
translation.zh: ‎那么白人的权力结构根本就不会担心

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -We know you are.

translation.zh:

he was their most direct experience and encounter
translation.zh:
‎他是他们
‎与伊利贾穆罕默德的教义接触的

translation.en: with the teachings of Elijah Muhammad.

translation.zh:
‎当马尔科姆开始

translation.zh: ‎跟民族组织的利益出现了分期

translation.en: And, of course, this leads to more tension, more conflict.

"Some contagious quality about him

‎让他成为

translation.zh: ‎我们突然在凯瑟斯克莱的言辞中

Bruce Hills, a reporter for the Chicago Sun-Times,
translation.zh:
‎《芝加哥太阳时报》记者
‎布鲁斯希尔斯

translation.en: Somehow, he learns that there's a tomato-red Cadillac
translation.zh: ‎不知怎么 他发现伊斯兰大学后

translation.en: parked behind the University of Islam.
translation.zh: ‎停着一辆番茄红色凯迪拉克

translation.en: Cassius and Rudy and a few others come out.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯和鲁迪 还有其他人走下车

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] Bruce Hills gets excited. His eyes light up,
translation.zh: ‎布鲁斯希尔斯很兴奋 ‎他的眼睛亮了起来

translation.en: and he starts following Cassius' car.
Bruce gets Cassius to roll down the window.
[Randy] And he sees Cassius has a star and crescent pin on.
translation.zh:
‎他看到凯瑟斯
‎佩戴着一枚星月标志的胸针

translation.en: "What's going on? Are you a member of the Nation of Islam?"
translation.zh:
‎“怎么回事？
‎你加入伊斯兰民族组织了吗？”

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] And at first, Cassius Clay says, "No."
-And then he says… -[Randy] "Well, so what if I am?"
"It's a great organization."
And it continues until Rudy turns onto the freeway out of Chicago.
translation.zh:
‎对话一直持续到
‎鲁迪开上离开芝加哥的高速公路

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] Now, the story published by Bruce Hills,
it doesn't quite gain momentum yet in the press.
translation.zh: ‎并没有在舆论界激起多大的水花

translation.en: But it's obvious that he has a relationship with the Nation of Islam.
translation.zh:
‎但很明显
‎他和伊斯兰民族组织有联系

translation.en: The fact that Cassius Clay was somehow connected to this group
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯克莱与这个组织有关联的事实

translation.en: made a lot of white people nervous.
[reporter] And the FBI says the movement is a potential threat
translation.zh: ‎联邦调查局称该运动对国内安全

translation.en: to the internal security of the United States.
[Dr. Smith] J. Edgar Hoover was the director of the FBI,
translation.zh: ‎J埃德加胡佛时任肯尼迪政府时期

translation.en: working for the Kennedy administration.
Hoover and the FBI carried out a counterintelligence program
translation.zh:
‎胡佛和联邦调查局
‎针对削减伊利贾穆罕默德

translation.en: designed to cut the legs out from Elijah Muhammad and Malcolm X.
translation.zh:
‎和马尔科姆X的力量
‎实施了了反情报计划

translation.en: [Zaheer] Not just passive surveillance,
but active infiltration
designed to undermine the impact
that the Nation of Islam was having,
to neutralize the impact that Malcolm was having.
[Elijah] Every day now, they are planning
how to stop Elijah and his followers.
translation.zh: ‎如何阻止伊利贾和他的追随者

translation.en: -[crowd exclaims] -But I say, I think you a little late.
[President Kennedy] We are confronted primarily with a moral issue.
translation.zh: ‎我们主要面临着一个道义问题

translation.en: It is as old as the Scriptures
and is as clear as the American Constitution.
The heart of the question is,
whether all Americans are to be afforded equal rights
translation.zh: ‎能否让所有美国人都享有平等的权利

translation.en: and equal opportunities.
Whether we are going to treat our fellow Americans
translation.zh: ‎我们能否如希望别人对待自己那样

translation.en: as we want to be treated.
[reporter 1] From Dallas, Texas, the flash, apparently official,
President Kennedy died at 1 p.m. Central Standard Time.
translation.zh:
‎肯尼迪总统
‎于中央标准时间下午1点逝世

translation.en: [reporter 2] Down this avenue of sadness, they bring President John F. Kennedy,
translation.zh:
‎队伍载着殉难英雄
‎肯尼迪总统延这条悲伤的大道

translation.en: martyred hero,
to lie in state under the great dome of the Capitol.
translation.zh:
‎灵柩将送至国会大厦的
‎圆形大厅以供瞻仰

translation.en: [John] When Kennedy died,
Elijah Muhammad instructed all the temples
translation.zh: ‎伊利贾穆罕默德让所有清真寺

translation.en: to leave it to him to express the feelings of the Nation
translation.zh: ‎跟随他的带领 表达伊斯兰民族组织

translation.en: about the death of the president.
[reporter 3] Elijah Muhammad, from his home in Phoenix,  telephoned the newspaper
translation.zh:
‎伊利贾穆罕默德
‎从菲尼克斯家中致电报社

translation.en: ordering that a statement be placed on page one.
The statement reads,
"We with the world are very shocked at the assassination of our President."
translation.zh:
‎“我们和全世界
‎都对总统遇刺感到无比震惊”

translation.en: [Shabazz-Allah] I have to respect what the Messenger said.
No statement should be made.
I-- I got that.
For me, if you teaching the white man is the devil…
translation.zh: ‎我想 你告诉我白人是魔鬼

translation.en: …who the hell is Kennedy?
Far as I'm concerned, he didn't do a damn thing for me.
translation.zh: ‎就我而言 他没有为我做任何事

translation.en: [chuckling] I mean, I still got--
I still got to provide for myself. He ain't put no money in my pocket.
translation.zh:
‎我还得自力更生
‎他没往我口袋里放一分钱

translation.en: But I have to go with my father, the Most Honorable Elijah Muhammad.
translation.zh:
‎但我必须听从我父亲
‎伊利贾穆罕默德的话

translation.en: He did make it plain, don't make no statements.
translation.zh: ‎他说得很清楚 不要发表任何言论

translation.en: [John] In spite of the Messenger's instructions,
Malcolm spoke.
Malcolm X, second in command of the Black Muslim movement,
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆X 黑人穆斯林运动的副指挥

translation.en: expressed joy at the assassination of President Kennedy
at a Manhattan rally last Sunday.
translation.zh: ‎对肯尼迪总统遇刺表示高兴

translation.en: Malcolm said that the killing of the President
was an instance of "the chickens coming home to roost."
He added, and we quote,
"Being an old farm boy myself,
chickens coming home to roost never make me sad,
translation.zh: ‎有因必有果 我不觉得难过

translation.en: they always make me glad."
In Chicago today, Elijah Muhammad,
translation.zh: ‎今天在芝加哥 伊利贾穆罕默德

translation.en: the leader of the anti-white Muslim movement,
suspended Malcolm X and disavowed his statement.
translation.zh: ‎将马尔科姆X停职 并否认他的声明

translation.en: It gave Elijah Muhammad a socially acceptable excuse
translation.zh:
‎这给了伊利贾穆罕默德
‎一个社会可接受的理由

translation.en: for silencing Malcolm.
[Dr. Smith] He's not allowed to preach,
he's not allowed to appear at his mosque in Harlem.
translation.zh: ‎不可以出现在哈莱姆的清真寺

translation.en: And in fact, the members of that mosque
translation.zh: ‎事实上 那个清真寺的成员

translation.en: are not allowed to be associated with Malcolm.
translation.zh: ‎也不可以与马尔科姆有联系

translation.en: [Peter] This was a big breach in his life.
He regarded Elijah Muhammad as his personal savior.
translation.zh:
‎他把伊利贾穆罕默德
‎当成自己的救世主

translation.en: The Most Honorable Elijah Muhammad.
[Peter] His feelings were unquestionably deep, devout.
translation.zh: ‎他对他的感情很深 很虔诚

translation.en: [Malcolm] I want to apologize to you for having let you down,
translation.zh: ‎我想向你道歉 让你失望了

translation.en: for the mistakes that I've made, especially during the past year.
translation.zh:
‎为我的过错
‎尤其是过去一年中犯的错误

translation.en: And above all else, I am praying to Allah
translation.zh: ‎除此以外 我还向真主祈祷

translation.en: for mercy and forgiveness in your heart.
He is torn here between this idea that Elijah Muhammad is like his father,
translation.zh:
‎他很矛盾 伊利贾穆罕默德
‎在他看来 是父亲一样的人物

translation.en: and the fact that his father has got his hand around Malcolm's throat.
translation.zh:
‎然而这个像父亲一样的人
‎却掐住了马尔科姆的喉咙

translation.en: This growing rift was going to be a big problem
translation.zh:
‎这个日益加深的裂痕
‎对穆罕默德阿里等人来说

translation.en: for, among other people, Muhammad Ali.
[Muhammad] If Sonny Liston whups me,
I'll kiss his feet in the rain,
tell him he's the greatest, and catch the next jet out of the country!
translation.zh:
‎告诉他 他是最厉害的
‎并乘下一班飞机离开这个国家！

translation.en: That's what I think about Sonny Liston!
translation.zh: ‎这就是我对索尼利斯顿的看法

translation.en: [Dr. Boyd] You have, in Liston and Ali, a thug on one side
translation.zh: ‎利斯顿和阿里 ‎一个是恶棍暴徒

translation.en: and a loudmouth on the other side.
You can look at me, I'm loaded with confidence!
I can't be beat!
I had 180 amateur fights, 22 professional fights,
translation.zh: ‎我赢过180场业余比赛 22场职业比赛

translation.en: and I'm pretty as a girl!
People were scared to death of Liston.
Sonny Liston was a boxer who came out of the penitentiary,
translation.zh:
‎索尼利斯顿是个
‎从监狱走出来的拳击手

translation.en: who worked for organized crime as a leg-breaker.
translation.zh: ‎他以前从事有组织犯罪 是个打手

translation.en: You owed some money, you'd get a visit from Sonny.
translation.zh: ‎你欠了钱 索尼就会来拜访你

translation.en: He'll fall in eight to prove that I'm great.
translation.zh: ‎他会在八个回合内倒下 证明我很棒

translation.en: And if he keeps talking jive, I'm gonna cut it to five.
translation.zh:
‎他再胡说八道
‎我让他撑不过五个回合

translation.en: [Zaheer] Cassius, because of what he was focused on,
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯 因为他专注于比赛

translation.en: training for that major fight,
I don't think he was attuned to all of the internal dynamics
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他并不了解伊斯兰民族组织

translation.en: in the Nation of Islam.
[Dr. Smith] On January 15th, 1964, Malcolm, he's gonna head south.
translation.zh: ‎1964年1月15日 马尔科姆要去南方

translation.en: He's going to Miami with his family to visit Cassius Clay.
translation.zh:
‎他要和家人一起
‎去迈阿密看凯瑟斯克莱

translation.en: So, in advance of the trip, he calls Cassius,
translation.zh: ‎在出发去前 他给凯瑟斯打了电话

translation.en: and Cassius responds, "Great."
He's enthusiastic, he's excited to see him.
translation.zh: ‎他很热情 很期待见到他

translation.en: We know this call took place between Malcolm and Cassius,
translation.zh: ‎我们知道马尔科姆和凯瑟斯通话

translation.en: because a New York FBI agent
immediately called the field office in Miami
translation.zh: ‎立刻打电话给迈阿密办公室

translation.en: and provided a directive.
"Malcolm is arriving on this specific flight."
"Cassius Clay is going to be there."
"Make sure you tail their car."
[Ilyasah] Miami was the only place
where we had gone as a family together on vacation
and to be in someone else's home.
translation.zh:
‎住在别人家 ‎（凯瑟斯克莱的家
‎佛罗里达州迈阿密）

translation.en: That family photo of my mother
and my two elder sisters, Attallah and Qubilah,
translation.zh: ‎和我的两个姐姐阿塔拉和库比拉

translation.en: and I'm sitting on Muhammad Ali's lap.
translation.zh: ‎我坐在穆罕默德阿里的腿上

translation.en: For my father to take his wife and his babies
and go to his home,
it meant that my father trusted him 100%.
My dad considered him to be a friend. He considered him to be family, really.
translation.zh:
‎我父亲把他当作朋友
‎像家人一样看待他

translation.en: And Malcolm was one of those few people that he met that he could trust.
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆是他认识的人中
‎为数不多的 他能够信任的人之一

translation.en: [Zaheer] Malcolm was in need of allies.
He'd become isolated in the movement.
Cassius could be the big fish.
I think that is very possibly part of Malcolm's calculation.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得那很有可能是马尔科姆的谋划

translation.en: [Herb] You can't dismiss the possibility that he had those particular motives,
that it could be self-serving.
Somebody can-- You know, I can use and utilize,
because of his growing influentiality,
that he could help me too.
[Dr. Smith] Malcolm sends these pictures to two Black newspapers.
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆把这些照片
‎发给了两个黑人报纸

translation.en: Malcolm wants to remind Elijah Muhammad
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆想提醒伊利贾穆罕默德

translation.en: that Cassius Clay has the ability
to bring more members into the movement, and they're as close as brothers.
translation.zh:
‎吸引更多人加入运动
‎他跟克莱亲如兄弟

translation.en: [Randy] Malcolm says to Elijah Muhammad, "What would it be like
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆对伊利贾穆罕默德说 ‎“如果救世主日
‎也就是比赛结束后那天

translation.en: if for Savior's Day celebration…"
translation.zh:
‎“如果救世主日
‎也就是比赛结束后那天

translation.en: which was the day after the fight, "…if I show up with Cassius Clay?"
translation.zh: ‎我带凯瑟斯克莱 ‎参加庆祝活动怎么样？” ‎（拳王争霸赛）

translation.en: [Maryum] "I wanna come back, Honorable Messenger,
and I have someone who can help our cause."
translation.zh: ‎我认识对我们的事业有帮助的人”

translation.en: [Jerry] About a week before the fight,
Malcolm X shows up.
Malcolm goes to a couple of workouts in the camp.
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆到训练营看过几次练习

translation.en: He had been asked to leave
and go home.
That he could come back for the fight.
The real emphasis at that point
was whether or not Cassius Clay
was a member of the Nation of Islam.
They didn't want some Muslim being the heavyweight champion,
translation.zh: ‎他们不想让穆斯林当重量级拳王

translation.en: so they basically threatened him.
Cassius was about to pack up the bus to leave town,
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯要收拾东西坐车离开

translation.en: since they said they were canceling the fight,
but the promoters find out he was leaving, they came back and said,
translation.zh: ‎但承办方发现他要走 就跟他说

translation.en: "You just don't tell nobody you're Muslim. We won't say nothing."
translation.zh: ‎“别说你是穆斯林 我们会帮你保密”

translation.en: [Randy] February 25th, 1964.
Heavyweight championship of the world.
Malcolm has come back to Miami.
[promoter] Miami, Florida, where the Torch of Friendship
translation.zh: ‎佛罗里达迈阿密 友谊的火炬

translation.en: signifies a welcome to good people of all races and creeds.
translation.zh: ‎向所有种族和信仰的朋友表示欢迎

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] Remember, Miami is a segregated city,
translation.zh: ‎要知道迈阿密是种族隔离城市

translation.en: and he has to stay at a hotel that is only for Black people.
translation.zh: ‎他必须住在黑人专门的酒店

translation.en: [promoter] From the moment you drive up to the main entrance of the Hampton House,
translation.zh: ‎从你开车进入汉普顿之家的正门

translation.en: your welcome is assured.
A home away from home
to thousands of visitors from states of the United States
translation.zh: ‎我们接待成千上万来自美国各州

translation.en: and many foreign lands,
who seek the fabulous Florida sunshine.
translation.zh: ‎让他们尽情享受佛罗里达的阳光

translation.en: If you like to lose your money, then be a fool and bet on Sonny.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想输钱 就傻傻地赌索尼赢

translation.en: But if you wanna have a good day, then put it on Clay.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想走运 就押克莱赢

translation.en: [Robert] I always thought Sonny Liston
was really afraid of only one thing, and that was a crazy man.
translation.zh: ‎真正害怕的只有一种人 那就是疯子

translation.en: He'd come out of the system, and he'd spent time in jail
translation.zh: ‎他从监狱里出来的 他坐过牢

translation.en: where he had seen people go nuts.
Cassius used that,
harassing him, making fun of him.
At the weigh-in, he went nuts,
tried to get at Sonny Liston.
A crazy man who had nothing to lose could really hurt you.
translation.zh: ‎一个不计后果的疯子真的能伤到你

translation.en: [reporter] We're almost all set to go
for that world heavyweight championship fight.
translation.zh: ‎等待这场世界重量级拳王争夺战打响

translation.en: The puncher, champion Sonny Liston,
translation.zh: ‎拳击手 拳王索尼利斯顿

translation.en: the boxer, challenger Cassius Clay.
translation.zh: ‎拳击手 挑战者凯瑟斯克莱

translation.en: [Randy] Just before the fight, Cassius is nervous.
translation.zh: ‎在比赛开始前 ‎凯瑟斯很紧张

translation.en: This is a big fight. He's--
He's going to fight Sonny Liston, who is a bad man.
translation.zh: ‎他要和桑尼利斯顿那样的狠角色对决

translation.en: Suddenly, Malcolm X shows up in the locker room.
translation.zh: ‎突然马尔科姆X出现在更衣室

translation.en: [Rahman] They made prayer. He talked to my brother,
translation.zh: ‎他们祷告 又聊了一会儿

translation.en: gave my brother some instructions, and my brother came out very confident.
translation.zh: ‎他给了哥哥一些指导 当哥哥出场时 ‎他充满自信

translation.en: [Zaheer] Malcolm encouraged him to believe
that he had to bring with him into that ring
translation.zh: ‎虽没有真主的陪伴 但他也能

translation.en: the power of God, if not God himself.
[announcer] We're set for an exciting night here in Convention Hall, Miami Beach.
translation.zh:
‎这里是迈阿密海滩会场
‎我们将迎来激动人心的夜晚

translation.en: [Ilyasah] You know, with the support of your brother,
who believes just as deeply as you do,
you can pray to God
to give you the will to do what you must.
translation.zh: ‎赐给你意志 去做你必须做的事

translation.en: [announcer] Now the questions will be answered.
If it goes past the first round, there will be surprises already.
translation.zh: ‎比赛能超过一个回合都算是奇迹

translation.en: [Randy] Malcolm got a seat sitting in row seven, seat seven.
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆在第七排第七个座位坐下

translation.en: This is prophecy coming to truth.
-[bell sounds] -[announcer] And here they come.
Clay just laughs at him, backs away, bobbing, weaving.
translation.zh: ‎克莱只是嘲笑他、退后、移动、迂回

translation.en: Clay with a left and a right at play!
translation.zh: ‎克莱一记左拳 一记右拳！

translation.en: Liston's caught! Liston's bleeding under both eyes!
translation.zh: ‎利斯顿中招！利斯顿双眼都出血了！

translation.en: [Howard Cosell] The bell sounds for the fifth round, and he is having trouble with his eyes.
translation.zh: ‎第五回合开始 他的眼睛出了问题

translation.en: [announcer] His trainer yelled, "There's something in Liston's gloves."
translation.zh:
‎他的一个教练大喊
‎“利斯顿的拳套里有东西”

translation.en: Clay is blinking, said he can't see.
Here is Liston crouching, hitting the low body.
And Clay keeps blinking like he doesn't see Liston,
translation.zh: ‎克莱一直眨眼 好像看不清利斯顿

translation.en: and that will be fatal.
His great body and head movements kept him from Liston's punches.
translation.zh:
‎他凭借出色的身体和头部动作
‎躲开了利斯顿的攻击

translation.en: [announcer] Round five saw Cassius come back on the attack.
translation.zh: ‎第五回合 凯瑟斯再次进攻

translation.en: All through this fight,
Cassius has ripped that left hand into Sonny Liston's face.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯左拳击中索尼利斯顿的脸

translation.en: And here in the sixth round, Clay has taken control of the fight.
translation.zh: ‎第六回合 克莱控制住了比赛

translation.en: Round six ends. Liston moves very wearily to his corner.
translation.zh:
‎第六回合结束
‎利斯顿疲惫地走到角落

translation.en: [Howard Cosell] As we come up to round seven…
Wait a minute!
Sonny Liston's not coming out!
The winner and the new heavyweight champion of the world
translation.zh: ‎获胜者、新一任世界重量级拳王

translation.en: is Cassius Clay!
Every time I watch it, I still get goosebumps.
translation.zh: ‎每当我看到这一时刻都会起鸡皮疙瘩

translation.en: [Howard Cosell] Pandemonium has broken loose.
When he goes around the ring, and he points everybody out,
translation.zh: ‎他绕着擂台走 指着每个人说

translation.en: "I told you, I told you."
"I told you I was the greatest. I proved it."
translation.zh: ‎“我说过我是最棒的 我证明这一点”

translation.en: That moment, it'll stick with you the rest of your life.
I shook up the world!
"I shook up the world."
"I shook up the world."
I shook up the world!
He said he was the greatest, uh, all of the odds were against him.
translation.zh: ‎他说他是最棒的 所有人都预测我输

translation.en: He upset the oddsmakers.
He won. He became victorious. He became the champ.
translation.zh: ‎他赢了 他获得了胜利 他成为了拳王

translation.en: And the, uh, people who, uh-- Who understand psychology
and the-- The effect that, uh-- The psychological effect
that the image of one's hero has upon the person himself…
translation.zh:
‎心目中的英雄形象
‎会对这个人造成心理影响

translation.en: they knew that as soon as, uh-- If people begin to identify with Cassius,
translation.zh: ‎他们知道一旦人们开始认同凯瑟斯

translation.en: and the ki-- Type of image he was creating,
they would have trouble out of these Negroes.
Because they'd have Negroes walking around saying, "I'm the greatest."
translation.zh: ‎因为会有黑人走在街上 ‎说：“我是最棒的”

translation.en: Cassius say, "I am something righteous."
Cassius Clay, the greatest!
-Who's the prettiest fighter in history? -Cassius Clay!
translation.zh: ‎史上最漂亮的拳击手是谁？ ‎凯瑟斯克莱！

translation.en: -He is the greatest! -All right.
Fly like a butterfly, stings like a bee!
translation.zh: ‎像蝴蝶一样飞舞 像蜜蜂一样攻击！

translation.en: They leave the convention center, a small group of people.
Rudy, Cassius, Malcolm X,
Jim Brown, the great football player at the time,
translation.zh: ‎当时最棒的足球员吉姆布朗

And they come here…
[Randy] …to the Hampton House.
Cassius and Rudy sit back here on these very stools.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟斯和鲁迪当年就坐在这个位置

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] Cassius Clay the champion, eating a bowl of ice cream.
translation.zh: ‎拳王凯瑟斯克莱吃了一碗冰淇淋

translation.zh:
‎那是他认为最好的庆祝
‎吃一碗冰淇淋

translation.en: [stammers] One of the happiest times of my life.
translation.zh: ‎那是我一生中最幸福的时光

[Dr. Smith] Now, it's in this moment that they all say, "Well, we believed in you,"
translation.zh: ‎那时候他们都说：“我们相信你会赢”

translation.en: but it was Malcolm who believed in him.
translation.zh: ‎但最初相信他的人是马尔科姆

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] And that means something.
It's with gratitude that he celebrates with Malcolm.

translation.en: It's getting late,
and the story goes that Malcolm, Cassius Clay, Rudy, Jim Brown,
translation.zh:
‎据说马尔科姆
‎凯瑟斯克莱、鲁迪、吉姆布朗

[Randy] They go to Malcolm X's room.

this Louisville Lip, it's time to end that."

‎“是时候告别

translation.zh:
‎该说些正经事了” ‎（汉普顿之家

…by confessing Allah is God

translation.zh: ‎不 我不给任何人指导 ‎他是我的兄弟 我的朋友

translation.zh: ‎我告诉他我所知道和了解的东西

translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆X把他介绍给

translation.zh: ‎现在你是一个备受全世界尊敬的人”

translation.zh: ‎是的 那是我很想去的非洲国家之一

He was going to take the race situation

translation.zh: ‎美国自称是自由世界的领袖

translation.en: the supporter of human rights,
and brother Malcolm was out there saying,
"Hey, y'all, this is simply not happening."
Malcolm knew that this would be something
that would compel the federal government to move.
[Malcolm] Cassius is in a better position than anyone else
to restore a sense of racial pride

translation.zh: ‎针对国内 乃至全世界的的同胞

translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆和凯瑟斯变得亲密无间

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎周围有一群人 几百人围着他们

translation.zh: ‎芝加哥有个联邦调查局探员

that Elijah Muhammad has had phone conversations
translation.zh: ‎伊利贾穆罕默德和重量级拳王

translation.zh:
‎他接到一通

translation.zh: ‎听说你今天下午要到芝加哥

translation.zh:
‎他是我的兄弟 是那样没错

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我得先了解前因后果再做评论

translation.zh: ‎我此行主要目的之一就是了解实情

translation.zh:

"And I name him…

translation.zh: ‎他和使者一起出现在布道台上

out in the cold.
[Herb] Muhammad Ali, then, is in the crosshairs
translation.zh: ‎穆罕默德阿里成了争抢的对象… ‎（克莱留下）

translation.en: between two very powerful individuals,
two powerful Black leaders, Elijah Muhammad and Malcolm X,
translation.zh:

translation.zh:
‎对凯瑟斯来说

‎这是我们的历史

translation.zh: ‎了解自我 被人以原本的名字称呼

‎一个俄罗斯长相的人

translation.zh:

translation.zh:
‎-再来 我是谁？

translation.en: Muhammad Ali, Muhammad Ali.

translation.zh: ‎1964年 穆罕默德和马尔科姆

‎穆罕默德阿里

he was trying to bring the message of 22 million African-Americans
translation.zh:
‎他试图将两千二百万

-Salaam alaikum. -[crowd] Walaikum Salaam.
…and bring charges, you know, against the US.
in terms of their violation of human rights.

translation.zh:
‎我们的问题

translation.en: It's not a Negro problem, it's a problem of humanity.
translation.zh:
‎不只是黑人的问题
‎应该是全人类的问题

translation.zh: ‎他像一名代表 一名国会众议员

translation.zh: ‎激起了各地人民的强烈好奇和兴趣”

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我和凯瑟斯在联合国的合影

translation.zh: ‎为之神往 得到了大家 的支持

translation.zh: ‎他说我们必须从精神奴役中解放思想

Accra, Ghana,
outside the Ambassador Hotel…
Malcolm was with some of his American expat friends,
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆和一些美国外籍朋友在一起

translation.en: Maya Angelou and others.
Malcolm is being taken to the airport,
and outside the hotel,
and here comes Muhammad Ali.

he's been to Egypt and Saudi Arabia,
and in his journal,

when he surprisingly sees the champ,
he thinks that they're going to embrace as brothers.
translation.zh: ‎他以为他们会像兄弟般拥抱

translation.en: [Randy] Malcolm X keeps saying, "Muhammad, Muhammad."
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆X一直喊他：“穆罕默德”

translation.zh: ‎终于 穆罕默德阿里转向他说道

translation.zh: ‎你错了 兄弟 你做错了”

translation.zh: ‎他们的关系恶化 友谊破裂

translation.zh: ‎如父亲般的伊利贾穆罕默德

-[reporter] Yes. -[Malcolm] See what develops.
When he returned from Africa at JFK Airport,
translation.zh: ‎当他从非洲回来 抵达肯尼迪机场时

translation.en: my mother handed me over to my father,
and he's smiling. I don't know if that's a fond memory,
translation.zh: ‎他在笑 ‎我不知道那是美好的回忆

translation.en: or if it's because I've seen the photo so many times,
translation.zh: ‎还是因为我看过很多次照片

translation.en: but I feel like I see him looking at me
like he's waiting for something to happen.
And this is a golden Muslim mosque
that was presented to me by the Islamic Council of all Egypt.
translation.zh: ‎是埃及伊斯兰理事会送给我的

translation.en: [man 2] It's all solid gold, brother.
All solid gold.
Solid gold.
[man 3] Solid gold! Yes…
This is a gift to our leader and teacher for waking all of us up,
translation.zh:
‎这是我们的领袖和导师
‎用来让我们觉醒的礼物

translation.en: because we were in a bad state of condition before we heard him.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们在听说他之前
‎深处水深火热之中

translation.en: [man 3] Yes, sir!
[man 4] Hooray! Yes, sir!
Have you and Malcolm X, the man who helped convert you
translation.zh: ‎你和马尔科姆X ‎那个帮你改信黑人穆斯林的人

translation.en: to the Black Muslim movement,
translation.zh: ‎那个帮你改信黑人穆斯林的人

translation.en: have the two of you split?
When the Honorable Elijah Muhammad cuts a man off,
translation.zh: ‎当伊利贾穆罕默德将某人开除

translation.en: well then he's automatically cut off with all of his followers.
translation.zh:
‎就意味着此人
‎自动跟所有追随者断绝了关系

translation.en: My newspaper carried a story saying upon your return from Africa,
translation.zh: ‎我们的报纸有报道称你从非洲回来时

translation.en: you refused to stay at the Theresa Hotel, your former headquarters.
translation.zh: ‎拒绝住特蕾莎酒店 你以前的总部

translation.en: My leader told me-- Not my leader, but various officials
translation.zh:
‎我的领袖告诉我…
‎不是我的领袖 是众多教职人员

translation.en: said that it wouldn't be nice being in the same hotel that he was in,
translation.zh: ‎说跟他住同一家酒店不太好

translation.en: and whatever they say go.
[reporter] When Cassius Clay was in Accra,
translation.zh: ‎当凯瑟斯克莱在阿克拉的时候）

translation.en: he was quoted as saying things that were, um, not so friendly.
Uh, could you have anything to say about that?
I don't know anything about what he said.
I'm always reluctant to believe what I read in the newspaper
translation.zh: ‎我总是不愿相信在报纸上看到的东西

translation.en: that one Black man supposedly said about another Black man.
translation.zh: ‎报道一个黑人对另一个黑人的评价

translation.en: [reporter] He was--
And if I have anything at all to say about Cassius, I'll say it to him.
translation.zh:
‎如果我有话想对凯瑟斯说
‎我会跟他本人说

translation.en: I don't even talk about Malcolm X.
He's not in our mind. He's a little--
translation.zh: ‎我们都不去想他 他有点…

translation.en: We don't worry about Malcolm X. We have too much to do,
translation.zh:
‎我们不去考虑他的事
‎我们有很多事要做

translation.en: and he's just one individual who, as we say, went astray.
[reporter] Do you still consider him a friend?
Yes, I consider all of our people my friend.
translation.zh: ‎是的 所有黑人都是我的朋友

translation.en: And usually, those who act unfriendly
are only reflecting the poison that someone else has put in them.
translation.zh: ‎只是因为他们的思想受到某人的毒害

translation.en: I-- I'm wondering if you still believe, as I think you certainly did
translation.zh:
‎当你和黑人穆斯林运动结盟时
‎是否还相信

translation.en: at the time you were allied with the Black Muslim movement,
in a segregated Black nation in North America?
translation.zh:
‎种族隔离的黑人国家？
‎我想你以前是认同的

translation.en: I don't believe in any form of segregation or any form of racism.
translation.zh:
‎我不相信任何形式的
‎种族隔离或种族歧视

translation.en: -Are you still a Muslim? -[Malcolm] Oh yes.
I'm a Muslim. I believe in the religion of Islam,
translation.zh: ‎我是穆斯林 我信伊斯兰教

translation.en: which believes in brotherhood.
Complete brotherhood of all people.
Malcolm felt that he was now a big man before the public,
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆觉得自己成了
‎公众面前的大人物

translation.en: and this seemed to have been his desire.
He wanted to be seen and heard.
He wanted to exalt himself above his teacher.
translation.zh: ‎他想凌驾于自己的导师之上

translation.en: [Zaheer] Once Malcolm is labeled a hypocrite…
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆被冠以“伪善者”之名后

translation.en: …it marks him.
What people think hypocrite means
or permits them to contemplate to do,
translation.zh: ‎这个词赋予他们去做某些事的权利

translation.en: puts him in an extremely vulnerable position.
[Wali] We definitely look at that as one of the worst things you could do,
translation.zh: ‎我们认为人最可恶的一种本质

translation.en: is be a hypocrite.
Uh, you know, we don't affiliate ourselves with hypocrites,
and we let Allah take care of our hypocrites.
-[reporter] Why are they threatening you? -Well, primarily because they're afraid
translation.zh: ‎他们为何威胁你的生命？ ‎主要是因为他们害怕

translation.en: that I will tell the real reason that they've been--
translation.zh: ‎怕我道出退出黑人穆斯林运动的

translation.en: That I'm out of the Black Muslim movement, which I never told, I kept to myself.
translation.zh: ‎真正原因 ‎我从没说过 一直保密

translation.en: But the real reason is that Elijah Muhammad,
translation.zh: ‎但真正的原因是伊利贾穆罕默德

translation.en: the head of the movement,
is the father of eight children by six different teenage girls.
translation.zh: ‎有八个私生子 母亲分别是六个少女

translation.en: Different, uh-- Six different teenage girls
who were his private personal secretaries.
Shouldn't have talked about him like that. Elijah Muhammad?
translation.zh: ‎他不该那样说伊利贾穆罕默德

translation.en: Taught you everything you knew.
Gonna turn against that man? What a fool.
[Shabazz-Allah] That's a mistake he made.
Your mission and your personal life is separate.
If I got a package for you,
and my mission's to come across the street and give you the package,
translation.zh: ‎我的使命是过马路将包裹交给你

translation.en: that's my mission.
If you see me across the street with a young girl,
translation.zh: ‎若你看到我过马路时带一个年轻姑娘

translation.en: or drinking a quart of wine,
that ain't none of your business.
'Cause I fulfilled my mission.
The Messenger's job is not to discuss or explain his personal life.
translation.zh:
‎使者的任务不是
‎讨论或解释他的私生活

translation.en: His job is to deliver the message.
Who in the hell are you to question the Messenger
translation.zh: ‎你算什么 竟敢质疑使者？

translation.en: who took you out of a garbage can, cleaned you up,
translation.zh:
‎他把你从垃圾堆里捡出来
‎让你焕然一新

translation.en: and put you in front of the world
as the number-one spokesman for Black people?
Now you gonna question him?
No, no.
[Rahman] When Malcolm did that,
talked about Elijah, said some bad things about his lifestyle
translation.zh: ‎谈论伊利贾 讨伐他的私生活

translation.en: with women and things like that,
everybody that loved Elijah turned against him.
translation.zh: ‎让所有爱戴伊利贾的人都与他为敌

translation.en: He shouldn't have said that.
Too many people love Elijah. They would kill for Elijah.
translation.zh:
‎伊利贾受太多人的爱戴
‎他们会为伊利贾杀人

translation.en: They did.
[Herb] February the 14th, 1965,
Malcolm's house was firebombed in East Elmhurst.
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆
‎在东艾姆赫斯特的房子被火烧了

translation.en: [reporter] His house in Queens was seriously damaged by fire,
translation.zh: ‎他在皇后区的房子被严重烧毁

translation.en: a fire started by Molotov cocktails.
[Ilyasah] For my mother, a bomb was thrown into the nursery
translation.zh: ‎对我母亲而言 燃烧瓶被丢进儿童房

translation.en: where her babies slept.
translation.zh: ‎房间里 孩子们正在熟睡

translation.en: That has got to be frightening.
My house was bombed.
It was bombed by the Black Muslim movement
translation.zh: ‎被黑人穆斯林运动的人炸了

translation.en: upon the orders of Elijah Muhammad.
They had planned to do it from the front and the back
translation.zh: ‎他们同时对房子的前后发起攻击

translation.en: so that I couldn't get out.
I was working the graveyard shift
in one of the automobile plants in Detroit.
He was supposed to be on the schedule to come to Detroit to speak.
When I heard early in the morning hours
that his house had been firebombed in East Elmhurst,
translation.zh: ‎他在东艾姆赫斯特的房子被人烧了

translation.en: I knew he was not coming.
I was wrong.
At nine o'clock, Malcolm was on a plane,
translation.zh: ‎9点钟 马尔科姆上了飞机

translation.en: came to Detroit, spoke at Ford Auditorium.
translation.zh: ‎来到底特律 在福特礼堂完成了演讲

translation.en: A friend of mine attended, said he could smell the smoke on him,
translation.zh:
‎我一个朋友去了现场
‎说能闻到他身上的烟味

translation.en: what he had salvaged from his house after being firebombed.
translation.zh:
‎他被从火场中救出来后
‎身上残留的烟味

translation.en: [police spokesman] There were about 400 persons present in the ballroom here,
representing the--
An organization known as the Afro-American Unity Organization…
translation.zh: ‎一个叫做非裔美国人团结组织的机构

translation.en: …uh, headed up by Malcolm X.
[A. Peter] The Audubon Ballroom was a huge ballroom,
translation.zh: ‎奥杜邦舞厅是个大型宴会厅

translation.en: but it had a very small lobby area.
I was sitting in the lobby, facing the-- The entrance.
I guess I'd been there maybe 10, 15 minutes at the most,
translation.zh: ‎我待了大概十分钟 顶多十五分

translation.en: and I heard Brother Malcolm say assalamu alaikum,
translation.zh: ‎我听到马尔科姆说“愿平安与你同在”

translation.en: and next thing I heard was shots.
[Malcolm] Salaam alaikum.
[woman] I saw people crawling on the floor,
and so I got down too.
And my children were crying, you know,
"What's going on? What's going on? Are they gonna shoot us?"
I knew they had shot my husband.
[A. Peter] I ran forward.
I saw Malcolm hold his side and hold his stomach and fell down.
translation.zh:
‎我看到马尔科姆捂着身体的一侧
‎捂着肚子 倒在地上

translation.en: We have two suspects in custody now.
One of these men was arrested on the street
by one of our patrolmen close by.
[reporter] Are they members of the, uh, Black Muslims?
translation.zh: ‎他们是黑人穆斯林的成员吗？

translation.en: I would not know that.
-[reporter] How do you feel now? -[man] I wanna kill somebody.
That's right, I wanna kill somebody.
Before the night's over, if Malcolm dies, somebody gonna die.
translation.zh: ‎若今晚马尔科姆死了 必须有人陪葬

translation.en: [Herb] He was our manhood.
He was the-- A milestone, you know, our anchor.
translation.zh: ‎他是我们的里程碑 是我们的靠山

translation.en: Malcolm X was the greatest Black man since Marcus Garvey.
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆X是
‎自马库斯加维以来最伟大的黑人

translation.en: And when you lost it, you found out
how really lost you were as a people.
[crowd singing] ♪ We shall overcome some day ♪
[reporter 1] Mr. Muhammad, yesterday in a wire story, uh,
translation.zh: ‎穆罕默德先生昨日通过媒体表示

translation.en: a Muslim was quoted as saying, uh, that,
"The chickens had come home to roost on Malcolm,"
in reference to Malcolm's earlier statement
about the assassination of President Kennedy.
translation.zh: ‎对于肯尼迪总统遇刺的评论

translation.en: Do you feel a Muslim brother would make such a statement about Malcolm
translation.zh:
‎你觉得穆斯林兄弟
‎在得知马尔科姆的死讯后

translation.en: upon learning of his death?
Well, I don't know.
I know nothing about who it was any more than you.
translation.zh: ‎我跟你一样不知道是谁干的

translation.en: [reporter 2] Has any police force, sir, asked you for a statement?
No, sir.
[reporter 1] Mr. Muhammad, Malcolm, before he was killed yesterday,
translation.zh:
‎穆罕默德先生
‎马尔科姆在昨日遇害前

translation.en: said the Black Muslims were trying to kill him.
translation.zh: ‎曾说过 黑人穆斯林想杀他

translation.en: Would you comment on that?
I know nothing about it.
We're not, uh, violent people.
This is a shock to us.
[documentary interviewer] What do you think happened to Malcolm X?
translation.zh: ‎你认为马尔科姆X之死是怎么回事？

translation.en: -What do I think? -[documentary interviewer] Yes.
What I know, what happened to him.
I know he deviated and…
And he died.
[Zaheer] It's very easy to tell the story of the assassination of Malcolm X
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆X被暗杀的事很容易

translation.en: as a story of a dissident
who leaves a movement and is punished for that.
And certainly, there was definitely bad blood
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆和伊斯兰民族之间

translation.en: between Malcolm and the Nation of Islam.
[Zaheer] But from what we have been able to glean from the released FBI files,
translation.zh: ‎但根据我们从联邦调查局 ‎未公开的档案中

translation.en: and they have not all been released, is that the FBI was gleefully
translation.zh: ‎收集到的信息来看 ‎联邦调查局很乐于

translation.en: watching this gap, this split grow,
translation.zh: ‎看到马尔科姆与伊斯兰民族

translation.en: and grow bitterly between Malcolm
and the Nation of Islam.
The hidden hand was the federal government.
They would never let a white man shoot Malcolm,
translation.zh: ‎他们绝不会让白人枪杀马尔科姆

translation.en: 'cause that would have been… catastrophe.
Now, you always have, excuse my expression,
niggas who will sell out their mother for $2.
translation.zh: ‎黑人为了两美元连母亲都肯出卖

translation.en: [reporter] Police are everywhere, on rooftops,
standing on fire escapes, in plain clothes,
and hundreds of New York City policemen in uniform along 147th Street.
translation.zh:
‎第147号大街上
‎有数百名穿制服的警察

translation.en: So far, the last rites for Malcolm X
translation.zh: ‎目前为止马尔科姆X的告别仪式

translation.en: are being performed without incident.
[Ilyasah] My sisters and I lost our father…
translation.zh: ‎我和我的姐妹们失去了父亲

translation.en: …but I think for Black people,
that we lost someone who was brilliant,
kind, loving,
very compassionate.
I think that you have to be
in order to have such a profound reaction to injustice.
translation.zh: ‎对不公做出有影响力的反应

translation.en: [Dr. West] James Baldwin wrote of Malcolm X,
translation.zh: ‎詹姆斯鲍德温对于马尔科姆X写道

translation.en: "He was the most gentle and tender man I ever met."
translation.zh: ‎“他是我见过最绅士、最温柔的人”

translation.en: That's not the image of Malcolm. But he saw Malcolm relating to Black folk.
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆的形象不是那样 ‎但他看到马尔科姆和黑人同胞相处

translation.en: [Shabazz-Allah] He honored his own code that he taught us.
translation.zh: ‎他履行自己的守则 他教导我们

translation.en: Accept death.
Once you accept death, you're free.
translation.zh: ‎一旦接受死亡 你就自由了

translation.en: [reporter] The day before Malcolm X was to be buried,
Elijah Muhammad made his first public appearance since the assassination.
translation.zh:
‎伊利亚穆罕默德
‎自刺杀事件后首次公开露面

translation.en: The Nation's leader was barely visible behind the human wedge of bodyguards.
translation.zh:
‎民族组织领袖
‎被保镖组成的人盾层层围住

translation.en: If you would like to follow anyone against me,
go ahead and do it.
-[crowd clamors] -But your, uh--  That-- Your end will be pretty bad.
-[crowd clamors] -I fear for you.
[reporter] Also in Chicago, participating in the Muslim convention,
translation.zh: ‎在芝加哥参加穆斯林大会的

translation.en: is the heavyweight champion Cassius Clay.
translation.zh: ‎还有重量级拳王凯瑟斯克莱

translation.en: His adopted Muslim name: Muhammad Ali.
translation.zh: ‎他该叫穆斯林名字：穆罕默德阿里

translation.en: [Muhammad] Malcolm X and anybody else who attacks
or talks about attacking Elijah Muhammad will die.
translation.zh:
‎或者声称
‎攻击伊利贾穆罕默德的人都会死 ‎（1965年3月）

translation.en: No man can oppose the Messenger of Almighty God, uh,
translation.zh:
‎任何反对全能神的使者之人
‎都无法逍遥法外

translation.en: verbally or physically, and get away with it.
translation.zh: ‎无论是语言攻击还是武力伤害

translation.en: [Dr. Smith] Muhammad Ali becomes part of this chorus,
that anyone who crosses Elijah Muhammad must die.
translation.zh: ‎任何忤逆伊利贾穆罕默德之人都得死

translation.en: That's the tragedy in all this.
That Malcolm is the enemy?
Was Malcolm the enemy when he brought his family to Miami?
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆带家人到迈阿密时
‎他是敌人吗？

translation.en: Did he think that Malcolm was the enemy when he prayed with him before his fight?
translation.zh: ‎当马尔科姆跟他在战斗前 ‎祈祷时 他把他看做敌人了吗？

translation.en: Malcolm X got famous
mainly being hard on people like you, white people.
translation.zh: ‎主要因为怒斥像你这样的白人

translation.en: White devils, you blue-eyeded, blond-headed dog.
translation.zh: ‎白色魔鬼 蓝眼睛的金发狗

translation.en: Whites cared nothing about Malcolm nor so-called Negroes
translation.zh:
‎当马尔科姆和尊敬的
‎伊利贾穆罕默德在一起时

translation.en: when he was with the Honorable Elijah Muhammad,
translation.zh: ‎白人不在乎他和他们口中的黑人

translation.en: but they seem to love and follow our dead leaders,
translation.zh: ‎但他们似乎爱戴我们那些死去的领袖

translation.en: and now they have a dead man who was nothing but a--
translation.zh: ‎现在有一个人死了 他只不过是一个…

translation.en: And he admit himself, Malcolm,
was a tramp, a…
Had white women selling their body for him.
translation.zh: ‎有白人女性为他出卖身体吗？

translation.en: He was nothing until the Honorable Elijah Muhammad made him great.
translation.zh:
‎没有尊敬的伊利贾穆罕默德
‎他什么都不是

translation.en: And if Malcolm X had stayed with the man that made him great,
translation.zh: ‎如果马尔科姆X留在那个成就他

translation.en: taught him everything he knew, today, he'd have been big, big, big.
translation.zh:
‎教他一切的人身边
‎他今天会是个了不起的人物

translation.en: [Maryum] In '72, my father went to Mecca.
And that is what got my father to true Islam.
translation.zh: ‎那让我父亲加入了真正的伊斯兰教

translation.en: Elijah Muhammad, leader of the Black Muslims,
translation.zh: ‎黑人穆斯林的领袖伊莱贾穆罕默德

translation.en: died of heart failure today in Chicago.
translation.zh: ‎今日因心脏衰竭在芝加哥去世

translation.en: He was 77 years old.
We left the Nation, I believe, around '75.
translation.zh: ‎我们大概在1975年退出了民族组织

translation.en: I was seven years old.
[Rahman] My brother was so good.
See, you gotta be me to understand how I feel.
I was the only brother. Only one brother.
translation.zh: ‎我是他唯一的兄弟 就我一个弟弟

translation.en: [stammers] Blood brothers.
I miss him so much, but I'm going to see him in heaven.
translation.zh: ‎我很想他 我会在天堂与他重逢

translation.en: Oh, I can't wait to see him. I will hug and kiss him.
translation.zh: ‎我想快点见到他 我会拥抱 亲吻他

translation.en: [documentary interviewer] Do you remember anything that Muhammad Ali regretted?
translation.zh:
‎你记得穆罕默德阿里
‎有什么后悔的事吗？

translation.en: Let me think.
-Let me think a few minutes here. -[documentary interviewer] Yeah.
That's a hell of a-- Hell of a question.
[Herb] So many years are gonna go by,
and we're always curious about a generation or two from now,
translation.zh: ‎我们总是好奇再经过一两代人之后

translation.en: and what perceptions are they gonna have,
what estimations will they have of Muhammad Ali,
of Malcolm X?
You know, what were the trajectories of their lives, and what did it mean?
translation.zh:
‎他们的人生历程是怎样的
‎有何种意义？

translation.en: Already we can see it being played out
in different literature, different films,
different venues.
[commentator] Look who gets it next.
[commentator] The greatest.
[Dr. Boyd] The Ali that has been presented to the public
translation.zh: ‎从1996年开始 展现在公众面前的

translation.en: since 1996
is a false image.
They've managed to edit out
those things that made Muhammad Ali controversial in another era.
translation.zh:
‎会在另一个时代
‎引起争议的东西被删掉了

translation.en: [Dr. West] The same people who gave him a standing ovation in Atlanta…
translation.zh:
‎那些在亚特兰大奥运会上
‎给他起立鼓掌的人

translation.en: …the same people 20 years earlier
had talked about him like a dog.
[Dr. Boyd] He was a strident critic of white supremacy.
translation.zh: ‎他是白人至上论的尖锐批判者

translation.en: [Muhammad] And I just don't think I should go 10,000 miles from here
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我不会大老远跑到别的地方

translation.en: and shoot some Black people who never called me nigger,
never lynched me, never put dogs on me, never raped my mama.
translation.zh:
‎没对我用过私刑 没放狗咬我
‎没侵犯我妈妈的黑人

translation.en: And I think a lot of that got written out
because of his illness
and the fact that he wasn't really able to speak.
[Malcolm] And even today, America is still a country whose governmental system
translation.zh:
‎即使到了今天
‎美国仍是一个政治制度

translation.en: is based upon freedom, justice and equality for white people only.
translation.zh:
‎建立在白人的自由
‎公正和平等之上的国家

translation.en: There's no such thing as freedom in this country for a Black man.
translation.zh: ‎黑人在这个国家没有自由可言

translation.en: Malcolm, of course, got killed in '65
and so people have been rewriting his narrative ever since.
translation.zh: ‎自那以后 人们就在撰写他的故事 ‎（马尔科姆X大道）

translation.en: First time I went to the post office to buy Malcolm X stamps, I was conflicted.
translation.zh:
‎我第一次去邮局
‎买马尔科姆X的邮票时 内心是矛盾的

translation.en: When Malcolm was killed in 1965,
no one would've imagined that he would ever be
on any official product of the US government.
Seeing Malcolm on a stamp is really symbolic
translation.zh: ‎马尔科姆的形象出现在邮票上

translation.en: of how his image changed over time.
translation.zh: ‎象征着他的形象已随着时间发生改变

translation.en: [Herb] To a certain extent, he still lives with us.
translation.zh: ‎从某种程度来说 他仍在我们身边

translation.en: He hasn't been taken away.
The spirit of him lives.
[Shabazz-Allah] You can kill a man, but you can't kill the idea.
translation.zh: ‎你能杀死一个人 ‎但无法杀死信念

translation.en: Every junior high school, every college, every university, all over YouTube,
translation.zh:
‎每所初中、每所学院
‎每所大学 在油管上

translation.en: they playin' Malcolm's audios and videos just like he's still here.
translation.zh:
‎都在播放马尔科姆的音频和视频
‎就像他还活着一样

translation.en: And what he was teaching 50 years ago,
you see it happening today.
Black history, American history, and world history changed
translation.zh:
‎黑人历史、美国历史
‎和世界历史都发生了改变

translation.en: because of these two guys that had the nerve
to be themselves and be bold.
And that boldness became contagious.
…it's the two-legged dog that controls…
[Rev. Sharpton] They defined a whole generation
of where we walked with our heads held high
and our shoulders back.
[Maryum] People forget my father was still this young man in his 20s
translation.zh: ‎大家都忘了我父亲还是那个20多岁

translation.en: whose eyes was on a championship.
There are things that Malcolm taught him that my father kept with him
translation.zh:
‎马尔科姆教给我父亲的东西
‎一直影响着他

translation.en: until his last day.
[documentary interviewer] How did your brother feel about Malcolm X
after he was assassinated?
Did he ever talk to you about regrets or how he felt?
translation.zh:
‎他有没有跟你说过后悔
‎或谈过他的感受？

translation.en: He never did, but I know my brother. He--
He felt-- He felt bad.
It hurt my brother bad, yes.
[Ilyasah] Once he severed ties with the Nation of Islam,
translation.zh: ‎穆罕默德阿里与伊斯兰民族组织

translation.en: Muhammad Ali reached out to our family.
I think Muhammad Ali likely felt
translation.zh: ‎我想穆罕默德阿里可能觉得

translation.en: that he owed it to my father
to make sure that his wife and his babies were safe
translation.zh: ‎他要保障他的妻子和孩子的安全

translation.en: and that they were okay.
[Attallah] There was a double take when I came upon him,
somewhere between me turning 18, 19 or 20.
Now looking right into his face--
You know how he is.
You know, he gives you that little dare like, "Is that you?"
From the very moment we found one another,
it was as if no time had passed at all.
We cried out loud.
His grief for having not spoken to my dad before he left.
translation.zh:
‎他对于没能在我父亲离世之前
‎跟他说上一句话感到悲痛万分

translation.en: Having Muhammad Ali in my life somehow sustained my dad's breath for me
translation.zh:
‎穆罕默德阿里仿佛延长了
‎父亲在我生命中的存在

translation.en: just a little while longer,
[voice breaking] 51 years longer.
Until now.
[Muhammad] I upset Sonny Liston, and I just turned 22 years old.
translation.zh: ‎我打败了索尼利斯顿 我才22岁

translation.en: I must be the greatest!
I am the king of the world!
[Malcolm] He's my brother and my friend.
translation.zh: ‎他是我的兄弟 我的朋友

translation.en: I express what I know and understand around him,
translation.zh: ‎我告诉他我所知道和了解的东西

translation.en: but he has a mind of his own, an understanding of his own.
[Ilyasah] It was destiny that they would feel that brotherhood
translation.zh: ‎他们注定会结下那段兄弟情谊

translation.en: and learn together.
But there were these outside forces
that prevented them from continuing
this beautiful relationship that had started.
[Hana] We were writing my father's autobiography, The Soul of a Butterfly,
translation.zh: ‎我们写父亲的自传 ‎《蝴蝶的灵魂》时是2003年

translation.en: it was in 2003,
I asked him about Malcolm X
and how he felt about the relationship and how it ended.
translation.zh: ‎他对这段感情和它的结束有什么感想

translation.en: And I remember,
my father sat back in his chair and he closed his eyes…
translation.zh: ‎我父亲坐在椅子上 闭上眼睛

translation.en: …and it took him a little bit to respond, maybe 10 or 15 seconds,
translation.zh:
‎他花了一点时间
‎大概10到15秒左右 才做出回应

translation.en: and he said to me--
He said that turning his back on Malcolm was one of his greatest regrets.
translation.zh:
‎他说背弃马尔科姆
‎是他最大的遗憾之一

translation.en: He wished that he could go back and tell Malcolm that he was sorry,
translation.zh: ‎他希望回到过去 向马尔科姆道歉

translation.en: that he loved him, that he was his friend,
and that he was right about so many things.
translation.zh: ‎对于很多事 他是对的 ‎（穆罕默德阿里清真寺 宾州鹿湖）

translation.en: [Ilyasah] One of the things that I'll never forget was…
looking up at Muhammad Ali and asking him,
translation.zh: ‎我望着穆罕默德阿里 问他

translation.en: "Did you love my father?"
And him saying,
"I loved your father with all my heart."
